childrenComponentProp.name: errorMessage
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Error string to display in the component. When defined, indicates input has a validation error.

childrenComponentProp.name: label
childrenComponentProp.docblock: `label` - String for the input field label.

childrenComponentProp.name: min
childrenComponentProp.docblock: minimum number value and maximum of same

childrenComponentProp.name: pattern
childrenComponentProp.docblock: String specifying the pattern for the input.

childrenComponentProp.name: required
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Render marker indicating field is required.

childrenComponentProp.name: onValueChange
childrenComponentProp.docblock: handler for the value change with this prototype: (newValue)
